sub_title: English and Dutch Translator specialised in gardens, health, revision (also postediting) and subtitling
summary:
An all-round entrepreneur with a wide variety of experiences, which all come together in my work as a translator and editor. I was born and raised in Rotterdam, while I am spending a lot of time (again) in Frimley, Surrey, UK.

Specialisations: Translating, Editing, Proofreading, Plant knowledge, Horticulture, Garden, Landscapes, Architecture, Design, Rotterdam, Articles, Blogs, Tourism, Business, Contracts, Medical, Technical, Marketing,  Organisational skills and getting things done.

Uitgeverij De Hef gaf recent het boek uit met haar biografie. Ik verzorgde de vertaling van de samenvatting naar het Engels.', 'image': None}, {'url': None, 'title': 'Website Translation for Inigo Advocaten', 'description': 'Inigo Advocaten is the law firm in Rotterdam which focuses specifically on immigration law. I had the pleasure to translate their website content from Dutch into English.', 'image': None}]

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'SRV Engels', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'SRV Engels', 'description': 'Offering Language Services Dutch and English with a professional background in Business, Editing, Health (medical secretary), Horticulture and Garden Design.

Services:
- Revision of English texts.
- Subtitling in English and Dutch.
- Machine-assisted human translation into English and Dutch.

Subjects:
- Floriculture, horticulture, hydroculture, plant knowledge.
- Contracts, agreements, codes of conduct, GDPR, immigration law, labour law, PRINCE02 management and logistics.
- Medical texts, including gynaecology, diabetes and the nursing courses TNCC and ENPC.
- Technical texts, including flowmeters, lifting equipment, medical user manuals.

Because of my (English) diplomas in Horticulture and Garden Design, I am the right person to take care of your translations on horticulture, gardens, and landscapes. Because of my work experience as a medical secretary, and my interest in technical matters, I am happy to work on technical and medical texts for the general public. I would also like to mention my background in design and architecture.

All translations to be checked by second language professional.
